verbose_text: However, it is important to note that PLK1 kinase inhibition only partially reduces Aurora B activity and kinetochore localisation, consistent with the existence of multiple and redundant mechanisms promoting Aurora B tethering involving Haspin phosphorylation of Histone H3 T3 and BUB1 phosphorylation of T120H2A, that recruits Borealin through Shugoshin.
evidence: PLK1 kinase inhibition only partially reduces Aurora B activity and kinetochore
